# Twistail UI Documentation for LLMs

> Twistail UI is a modular and extensible copy-paste React UI components powered by Radix UI, Tailwind CSS v4, Tailwind Variants, Lucide Icons, and TypeScript.

This site provides documentation in a format optimized for Large Language Models, with each page available as a clean markdown file.

## Complete Documentation

- [Complete documentation](https://twistail.com/llms.txt): The complete Twistail UI documentation including all general content, components, type helpers, and utilities

## Getting Started

- [Introduction Documentation](https://twistail.com/llms-full.txt): Detailed documentation for Introduction
- [Installation Documentation](https://twistail.com/llms-full.txt): Detailed documentation for Installation
- [Styling Documentation](https://twistail.com/llms-full.txt): Detailed documentation for Styling
- [Components Documentation](https://twistail.com/llms-full.txt): Detailed documentation for Components
- [Changelog Documentation](https://twistail.com/llms-full.txt): Detailed documentation for Changelog
